title: Bloomberg Markets: How Trump Could Puncture the Equity Bubble
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: How Trump Could Puncture the Equity Bubble
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Komal Sri-Kumar President/Founder Sri-Kumar Global Strategies Discussing his Bloomberg Prophets piece "How Trump Could Puncture the Equity Bubble." A delay in stimulus measures and the rise in global trade tensions could deflate valuations.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
